title: Travel Routines, Tricks, Recs, and Some Very Strong Opinions!
description:
We have been traveling quite a bit for our live shows and more, so we thought it was time to share some of our vastly differing opinions when it comes to travel. We talk about hotels, airplanes, beauty routines, packing, planning, and everything in between. Needless to say, we have some differing views on a lot of things! Today, in addition to hopefully amusing you with our strong opinions, we help you navigate some of the more stressful parts of traveling through our own experiences. (And did you know customs has an app?) We share all the things we do to keep organized (and sane!) when it comes to traveling.

Things Mentioned:

  • Aaptiv App
  • New York Times: 36 hours series
  • TSA Pre-Check
  • The Points Guy

Hotels Mentioned:

  • The Beverly Hills Hotel in Los Angeles
  • The Ritz Carlton
  • Brown’s Hotel in London
  • The Breakers in Palm Beach
  • La Sultana in Morocco
  • Hotel du-cap-eden-roc in France
  • The Statler Dallas

Products Mentioned:

  • Pregnancy Pillow from Amazon
  • Silk Pajamas from Karen Mabon
  • Cookware Set from Simply Calphalon
  • Tumi Suitcase
  • Away Suitcases

Instagram Obsessions:

  • @chloeiscrazy
  • @blonde_atlas
  • @bowenyang

Books Mentioned:

  • How Could She by Lauren Mechling (October book club pick)
  • The Flatshare by Beth O’Leary

 Sponsors: 

  • Borghese:  Special offer 25% sitewide borghese.com enter code BOP25 at checkout.
  • LOLA: You can 30% off your first month’s subscription with code BOP30 at www.mylola.com
  • Hello Fresh: For $80 off your first month hellofresh.com/BOP80 and enter code BOP80

Check out tickets to our Fall live shows in DC, Philly, Atlanta, New York City and Dallas.

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
